trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of model items that can be individually accessed by index.

If changes are made to the item collection during an editing scope, such as within a drag and drop operation, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection.Count%2A> property will not be updated until the editing scope completes.
Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
Adds a model item to the end of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
The model item to add to the collection.
Adds a model item to the end of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
The object will be stored as a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>.
The object to add to the collection.
Returns value wrapped in a .
Removes all elements from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
Occurs when the collection changes.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> contains the specified element.
The value to locate in the collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> contains an element that has the specified value; otherwise, `false`.
item is `null`.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> contains the specified element.
The value to locate in the collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> contains an element that has the specified value; otherwise, `false`.
value is `null`.
Copies the contents of the collection into the given array.
The array to copy the collection into.
The index in the array to start copying at.
array is `null`.
arrayIndex is out of range, or there is not sufficient room in the array to hold the contents of the collection.
Returns the count of items in the collection.
This value is not updated during an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> session.

If an object is added to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection> during a session, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection.Count%2A> value will not be updated until the session exits.
Returns the <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> count of items in the collection.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
Returns an <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a value in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
The object to locate in the collection.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of item within the entire , if found; otherwise, â€“1.
Inserts an element into the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which item should be inserted.
The model item to insert.
Inserts an element into the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The object to insert.
Returns value wrapped in a .
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection has a fixed size.
The default implementation returns `true` if the collection is read-only.
`true` if the collection is a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is read-only.
`true` if the collection cannot be modified; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
`true` if access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the item at the given index in the collection.
The zero-based index of the collection.
Returns <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
Identifies the Item dependency property.
The Item property represents all the items in the collection and is defined as type <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>.
The Item property points to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection> itself.
Moves an item in the collection to a different index.
The index of the item to be moved before the move.
The index of the item after it is moved.
Either fromIndex or toIndex is negative or greater than or equal to .
Removes the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> was removed from the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the value from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
`true` if the value was removed from the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the item at the given index.
The index of the item.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
Returns an <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> to an <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at a particular <xref href="System.Array"></xref> index.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
Returns an <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> value that is the number of elements contained in the collection.
The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.
Returns an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
Returns an <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Adds a model item to the end of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
The object to add to the collection.
Returns the index of the newly added object.
Removes all items from the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> contains the specified element.
The object to locate in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> contains an element that has the specified value; otherwise, `false`.
value is `null`.
Determines the index of a specific item in the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
Returns the index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
Inserts an element into the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The object to insert.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> has a fixed size.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> is read-only.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
If `value` is not found in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>, the <xref:System.Collections.IList> remains unchanged and no exception is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
Removes the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> item at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the item to remove.
